pageContext.claim: “I had dinner the other night with Tim Cook. It was fantastic. And they're spending a tremendous amount of money of the United States and I asked him, ‘Would you have done it without our tax reform and our tax plan?’ He said, ‘No, we wouldn't have done it.’”
pageContext.analysis: Apple announced a five-year investment plan in January that adds up to nearly $350 billion. Chief executive Tim Cook told ABC News that “there are large parts of this that are a result of the tax reform, and there’s large parts of this that we would have done in any situation.”
